CREATE TABLE Contact
(
   Id                     varchar(18) not null,     // pk
   Name                   varchar,       // readonly
   FirstName                   varchar,
   LastName                   varchar,
   AccountId            varchar(18),   // fk account
   ReportsToId          varchar(18)    // fk Contact
);
ALTER TABLE Contact ADD CONSTRAINT FakePK337 PRIMARY KEY (Id);
ALTER TABLE Contact ADD CONSTRAINT FakeFK338 FOREIGN KEY (AccountId) REFERENCES Account (Id);
ALTER TABLE Contact ADD CONSTRAINT FakeFK343 FOREIGN KEY (ReportsToId) REFERENCES Contact (Id);


CREATE TABLE Opportunity
(
   Id                   varchar(18) not null,     // pk
   AccountId            varchar(18),   // fk account
   Name                 varchar,

);

ALTER TABLE Opportunity ADD CONSTRAINT FakePK344 PRIMARY KEY (Id);
ALTER TABLE Opportunity ADD CONSTRAINT FakeFK345 FOREIGN KEY (AccountId) REFERENCES Account (Id);


CREATE TABLE OpportunityLineItem
